definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: stretch out, spread out, extend, incline, bend (NH id., incline, spread tent, etc.; Ar. nt.w stretch out);—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: stretch out, extend, hand, rod, usu. c. acc. + [[עַל]] of direction Ex 9:22, Ex 9:23, Ex 10:12, Ex 10:13, Ex 10:21, Ex 10:22 (all E), Ex 7:19, Ex 14:16, Ex 14:21, Ex 14:26, Ex 14:27 (all P), abs. Jos 8:19 (JE), Ex 8:12 (P); c. [[ב]] of dart or rod [[בַּכִּידוֹן אֶל־]] ´[[נ]] Jos 8:18, Jos 8:18 (JE), [[יׇֽדְ ְבְּמַêֶטּ ְעַל־]] ´[[נ]] Ex 8:1 (P), cf. v:Ex 8:2 and ([[עַל]] om.) v:Ex 8:13 (all P), Jos 8:26 (JE); fig. of hostility to God [[יׇדוֹ אֶל־]] ´[[נ]] Job 15:25; esp. of God stretching out his hand over ([[עַל]]) oft. with idea of against, i.e. in judgment, Is 5:25, Is 23:11, Zep 1:4, Zep 2:13, Ez Eze 6:14 + 7 t. Ez, Ex 7:5 (P); c. [[אֶל־]] against Joe 51:25, cf. sword Ez Eze 30:25; abs. Ex 15:12 (song); pt. pass. [[גׇּרוֹן]] ´[[נ]] Is 3:16 outstretched of neck; oft. [[זְרוֹע נְטוּיׇה]] arm stretched out (of ´[[י]]) to deliver, De 4:34 + 14 t. (v. [[זְרוֹעַ]]); ´[[אֶזְרוֹעַ נ]] Je 32:21; ´[[יׇד נ]], to oppose, Je 21:5; [[עוֹד יׇדוֹ נְטוּיׇה]] in judgment, Is 5:25 (‖[[לאׁ שָׁב אַפּוֹ]]), so Is 9:11, Is 9:16, Is 9:20, Is 10:4 (all ‖ id.), cf. Is 14:27; [[הַיׇּד הַנְּטוּיׇה עַל־]] v:Is 14:26; [[נׇטִיתִי יׇדִי]] Pr 1:24 (of wisdom's appeal; ‖[[קָרָאתִי]]).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: stretch line and plummet,

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[עַל]] 2Ki 21:13 (subj. ´[[י]] fig. of destruction), cf. Is 34:11, La 2:8; line, of artisan's measurements (abs.) Is 44:13, and (c. [[עַל]]) Job 38:5.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: = offer, only [[שָׁלוֹשׁ אֲנִי נׁטֶה עָלֶיְ]] 1Ch 21:10 three things do I offer unto thee (so rd. prob. also ‖ 2Sa 24:12, v. [[נטל]]).

Spread out, i.e. pitch, tent Ge 12:8, Ge 26:25, Ge 35:21 (all J), Ge 33:19 (E), Ju Jdg 4:11, cf. Je 43:10; fig. of establishing people Je 10:20; of sacred tent Ex 33:7 (JE), 2Sa 6:17 = 1Ch 16:1, 1Ch 15:1, 2Ch 1:14; obj. heavens (spread out by ´[[י]] as tent) Je 10:12 + 9 t., cf. Job 26:7; obj. likeness of firmament in Ezek.'s vision Ez Eze 1:22.
Bend, turn, incline:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: intrans., of wady Nu 21:15 (JE; c. [[לְ]]); turn aside, of Balaam's ass Nu 22:23 ([[מִן־הַדֶּרֶךְ]]), v:Nu 22:33 ([[מִפָּנַי]]), cf. v:Nu 22:33 ([[לְפָנַי]]); c. adv. acc. Nu 22:26, so of Isr. Nu 20:17, and (c. [[מֵעָלָיו]]) v:Nu 20:21; c. [[ב]] into, Nu 21:22; of individ. 2Sa 2:19 ([[לָלֶכֶת עַל]]), v:2Sa 2:21 ([[עַל]]), Je 14:8 (c. inf.); cf. Ge 38:1 ([[עַד]]), v:Ge 38:16 ([[אֶל־]]); fig. of deviating from path of loyalty 1Ki 2:28 (c. [[אַחֲרֵי]]), cf. Ju Jdg 9:3 (of heart), or of righteousness Ex 23:2 [yet on text cf. Bu:ZAW xi (1891), 113 Ry:ad loc.], 1Sa 8:3 (all c. [[אַחֲרֵי]]); c. [[מִן]] Job 31:7, Ps 44:19, cf. Pr 4:5 and (c. adv. acc.) v:Pr 4:27; ´[[מֵעִם י]] 1Ki 11:9 (of heart), cf. Ps 119:51, Ps 119:157; incline, (of heart), c. [[לְ]] 1Sa 14:7 (rd. [[לְבָֽבְ ְנׇטָה]] or [[נׁטֶה]] ´[[ל]] Th We Dr Klo Bu HPS Löhr); decline, of shadow on dial 2Ki 20:10 (‖[[הָלַךְ]], opp. [[שׁוּב אֲחׂרַנִּית]]), fig. of failing life Ps 102:12, Ps 109:23; of day Ju Jdg 19:8 + v:Jdg 19:9 (txt. emend., v. GFM); bend down, [[יִטֶּה לָאָרֶץ]] Job 15:29, [[לִנְטוֹת בָּאָרֶץ]] Ps 17:11 (both dub., v.Comm.); appar. [[וַיֵּט בְּכׂחַ]] Ju Jdg 16:30 and he bowed with all his might (after [[וַיִּלְפּׂת]], [[וַיִּסָּמֵךְ]]; al. stretched himself i.e. gave a thrust,

definitions.title: Be GFM
definitions.body: , but vb. less oft. intrans. in this sense); of ´[[י]], [[וַיֵּט אֵלַי]] Ps 40:2 and he inclined unto me,—[[וַתֵּט הַמִּלְחָמָה]] is rd. 1Sa 4:2 by LXX Dr Klo Bu, cf. [[נׇטַשׁ]]

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: less oft. trans., bend, bow, [[וַיֵּט שִׁכְמוֹ לִסְבּׂל]] Ge 49:15 (Issachar under fig. of ass); [[קְיר נׇטוּי]] Ps 62:4 (sim. of fate of wicked; ‖[[גׇּדֵר הַדְּחוּיׇה]]); here belongs also prob. [[וַאֲנִי כִּמְעַט נׇטוּי רַגְלָָי]] Ps 73:2 (Kt) and I was almost prostrated as to my feet (i.e. by stumbling; Qr [[נׇטָיוּ]] Pf. 3 mpl. but needless, cf. O1 Bae; ‖:[[כְּאַיִן שֻׁפְּכֻה אֲשֻׁרָֽי ]]); [[לִבִּי]] ´[[נ]] Ps 199:112 I have inclined my heart (c. inf.); of ´[[י]], [[וַיֵּט שָׁמַיִם וַיֵּרַדָ]] 2Sa 22:10 = Ps 18:10; also fig., hold out, extend unto, of ´[[י]], obj. [[חֶסֶד]] Ge 39:21 (J), [[שָׁלוֹם]] etc., Is 66:12 (both c. [[אֶל־]]); of men [[רָעָח]] Ps 21:12 ([[עַל]]). †

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: be stretched out;—Pf. 3 mpl. [[נִטָּ֫יוּ]] Nu 24:6 (JE; cf. II. [[נַחַל]]); Impf. 3 ms. [[יִנׇּטֶה עַל־]] Zec 1:16 (of measuring line, for building); stretch themselves out, i.e. grow long, 3 mpl. [[יִנׇּטוּ]] Je 6:4 (of shadows, ‖[[פָּנׇה הַיּוֹם]]).
rarely stretch out (as

definitions.title: Qal 1
definitions.body: ), hand Is 31:3 (of ´[[י]] in hostility), c. [[עַל]] Je 6:12, Je 15:6.
rarely spread out cloth on ([[אֶל]]) rock 2Sa 21:10; as

definitions.title: Qal 2:
definitions.body: tent 2Sa 16:22 (+ [[ל]] pers.), tent-curtains (fig. of growth) Is 54:2.
usu. turn, incline, c. acc., in many senses:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: lit. turn ass into (acc.) road Nu 22:23 (JE); take aside 2Sa 3:27 (acc. pers. + [[אֶל־]]), 2Sa 6:10 (acc. rei + acc. = to) = 1Ch 13:13 ([[אֶל־]]); incline, turn jar of water Ge 24:14 (J; to give drink); intrans. only [[יַטּוּ עַל־]] Am 2:8 on garments taken in pledge they recline, and [[הַטּוּ מִנֵּי־אׂרַח]] Is 30:11 turn aside, out of the path (i.e. do not interfere with us; ‖[[סוּרוּ מִנֵּי־דֶרֶךְ]]).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: fig., [[הַמַּטִּים עֲקַלְקַלּוֹתָם]] Ps 125:5 those turning aside their crooked (ways), i.e. making their ways crooked; cf. (neg.) Job 23:11.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: turn, = influence, heart 2Sa 19:15; turn (away) heart (cause to apostatize) 1Ki 11:2, 1Ki 11:4 (c. [[אַחֲרֵי]]), v:1Ki 11:3 (abs.); [[לֵב]] subj., c. acc. pers. Is 44:20 cf. Job 36:18 (acc. pers.); of persuasion, c. acc. pers. Pr 7:21 (‖[[תַּדִּיחֶנּוּ]]).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: incline one's own heart unto ([[אֶל]]) God and his commands, Jos 24:23 (E), cf. Pr 2:2 ([[ל]]); subj. ´[[י]], 1Ki 8:58, Ps 119:36, c. [[עַל־]] Pr 21:1; neg. (c. [[ל]]) Ps 141:4.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: esp. incline the ear, of men (in obedience to God), usu. ‖[[שָׁמַע]]: abs. Je 7:24 + 6 t. Je (all neg.), so Je 25:4, Je 44:5 (+ inf.), Is 55:3; to inspired teacher Pr 4:20 (‖[[הִקְשִׁיב]]), Pr 5:1 (‖ id.) v:Pr 5:13 (all c. [[ל]]), Pr 22:17, Ps 45:11, Ps 78:1 ([[הַאֲזִינׇה]]); to receive revelation Ps 49:5; of God, listening to men, sts. ‖[[שָׁמַע]]: 2Ki 19:16 = Is 37:17, Da 9:18, c. [[ל]] Ps 17:6; also (c. [[אֶל־]] Ps 31:3, Ps 71:2, Ps 102:3, c. [[לְ]] Ps 88:3, Ps 116:2, abs. Ps 86:1; once [[וְאַט אֵלָיו]] Ho 11:4 and I used to incline etc. (either rare intrans., or obj. om., e.g. [[אָזְנִי]] rd. perh. [[וׇאַט]] ([[וׇאֵט]] ?) and I inclined, after [[וׇאָהְיֶה]]).

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: bend down heavens, of ´[[י]] (cf.

definitions.title: Qal 3
definitions.body: b), Ps 144:5; = hold out, extend unto (from above, [[עַל]]) Ezr 7:28, Ezr 9:9 (obj. [[חֶסֶד]]).

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: thrust aside, esp. c. acc. [[מִשְׁפָּט]] of perverting or wresting justice: Ex 23:6 (E), 1Sa 8:3, De 16:19, De 24:17, De 27:19, La 3:35, cf. Am 2:7; [[לְהַטּוֹת אָרְחוֹת מִשְׁפָּט]] Pr 17:23; also c. acc. pers. [[לְהַטּוֹת מִדִּין דַּלִּים]] Is 10:2, Am 5:12, Is 29:21, Mal 3:5, [[יַטּוּ אֶבְיׁנִים מִדָָּרֶךְ]] Job 24:4, [[לְהַטּוֹת]] [[חַדִּיק בַּמִּשְׁפָּט]] Pr 18:5; here belongs prob. [[לְהַטּׂת]] Ex 23:2 (E; abs.), perh. ins. [[מִשְׁפָּט]] (cf. Bu:ZAW xi. (1891), 113 Ry:ad loc.).

definitions.title: h.
definitions.body: thrust away, of ´[[י]], [[אַל־תַּט בְּאַף עַבְדְֶָּ]] Ps 27:9; cf. [[עֲוֹנוֹתֵיכֶם הִטּוּ־אֵלֶּה]] Je 5:25 your iniquities have thrust away (deprived you of) these (harvests).
